resources.string: Here is my QUEST for the depths, the UNDERSTANDING of the Ancient Wisdom, the DEFINITION of my path.
BROKEN WILL, THIRSTY SOUL, SURRENDERED HEART, WAITING on the LORD on BENDED KNEES
WHERE ALL JEWEL IS DROSS AND LIGHTS FADE AS SHADOWS BENEATH, LIFTED HANDS AND BOWED HEARTS IN AWE WE WORSHIP

BOUND WITH CHORDS ENTWINED WITH THE ETERNALLY, TRANSFIXED IN YOUR GAZE, IN THAT GENTLE EMBRACE, MY WILL BROKEN, NO MORE IN DARKNESS GROPING. FOR HERE I KNOW, I HAVE FOUND LIFE, HE THAT IS THE DEFINITION OF ALL GOODNESS, LOVE ITS ETERNAL FOUNT
